post.author: 구게시판
post.content:
As a valued subscriber to htc - Canada's HiTech Career Journal, you are invited to come and
join us at BrassRing's Toronto Tech Career Event taking place within COMDEX 2001 on Wednesday,
July 11th through Friday, July 13th, at the Metro Toronto Convention Centre, 255 Front Street
West, South building, Booth # 2237. You are required to have 2+ years of technical
working experience to attend. Show hours are as follows: Wednesday & Thursday 10:00 a.m. to
5:00 p.m.; Friday 10:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m.

Visit BrassRing registration for your free pass to the COMDEX 2001 event.

You will have an opportunity to meet face-to-face with hiring managers from top Canadian and
U.S. firms who are looking to hire IT and Engineering professionals. So, please bring along
several copies of your resume on plain, white paper and be ready to conduct interviews on-site.

For further information or to submit your resume online, click here.

Regards,
J. Sharp
jsharp@BrassRing.com
post.title: [2001/07/05] Another BrassRing stuff... (작성자: COSKA)
